original_text: But you are powerful. These men did only what you said would happen. You had already decided on these events.
korean_text: 하나님의 권능과 뜻대로 이루려고 예정하신 그것을 행하려고 이 성에 모였나이다

sentences.original_text: These men did only what you said would happen
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 당신이 일어나리라고 말한 것만 했습니다

sentences.original_text: You had already decided on these events
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 이런 일들을 결정해 두셨습니다
